product_name: Leki Cressida Antishock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The perfect pole for long hikes, this women's model features an edgeless and compact grip, made especially for women's smaller hands, and an antishock tip for enhanced joint comfort on rough trails.
short_description: The perfect pole for long hikes, this women's model features an edgeless and compact grip, made especially for women's smaller hands, and an antishock tip for enhanced joint comfort on rough trails.
